player.name: Stephen Curry
player.physicalDescription: lean athletic build, light skin, baby-faced with confident smile
player.archetype: The Revolutionary, changed the game forever, unlimited range

figure.name: Elijah
figure.attributeDescription: prophet's hairy mantle/cloak wreathed in divine flames, fire descending from heaven above
figure.visualStyle: intense biblical prophet, wild and powerful
figure.clothing: rough hairy mantle (prophet's cloak) made of animal hair, simple worn garments beneath, leather belt around waist
figure.physicalDescription: weathered rugged appearance, wild untamed hair and long beard, piercing intense eyes that seem to burn with inner fire, lean and strong
figure.archetype: The Fire Prophet, called down fire from heaven, changed everything

connection.thematic: Both brought fire that changed everything - one from heaven, one from 35 feet
connection.narrative: Elijah called down fire from the sky. Steph rains fire from the logo. Different era, same energy.
connection.relationship: Revolutionary forces who made the impossible look routine

interactions.description: Back-to-back with fire and light swirling around them
Curry shooting, Elijah calling fire, flames falling from above
Both in triumphant poses, fire crackling, shimmy and prophecy fulfilled
